enhanced_by.reason: The split method relies on the worstCombination method to determine the initial groups, making it a critical prerequisite.
The split method invokes assignRemaining to distribute remaining items, indicating a sequential dependency.
Both split and getBestCandidateForGroup methods involve selecting items based on geometric properties, suggesting similar assertions can be derived.
The split method uses Util.mbr to calculate the minimum bounding rectangle, which can be used to assert the geometric properties of the resulting groups.
